description: Virgin Cucumber Gimlet is a bit of an old-time favorite. You may have seen cocktail recipes that use cucumber&nbsp;gin to add flavor in the past, but this recipe doesn't call for any sort of distilled alcohol. Instead the addition of fresh cucumbers create that crisp and cool taste.
name: Virgin Cucumber Gimlet

recipeInstructions.name: In a shaker, muddle cucumber and sugar until the cucumbers release their juices.
recipeInstructions.text: In a shaker, muddle cucumber and sugar until the cucumbers release their juices.

recipeInstructions.name: Add lime juice and simple syrup then fill with ice cubes. Shake well.
recipeInstructions.text: Add lime juice and simple syrup then fill with ice cubes. Shake well.

recipeInstructions.name: Strain into a high-ball glass filled with ice cubes, top off with club soda and stir gently.
